title: [Placements] Did anyone else NOT get the test link for CynLr ???
content: I'm well above the gpa cutoff and filled the form like an hour after they sent the link, this makes absolutely no sense ?

comments.body: Yeah man makes no fuckin sense to be frank hsbc they will call us to the campus be like go home and write it and then even for hsbc this shit happened
I think only specific roles got
Afaik electronics, electrical, sw devops cpp
Cynlr for my batch they asked very weird questions which will make you remember your 12th physics

This is completely the fault of pesu placements afaik, they do not have enough infra to conduct offline tests for all these students hence companies are forced to do it online. If I said what I wanted to say about somashekar I'd be behind the bars. I only go to the temple to pray for his demise now
Could u pls tell from what area they ask?
Could u pls tell from what area they ask?
